scripts.pods:next: cd ios && rm -rf Pods && rm -f Podfile.lock && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 USE_FRAMEWORKS=static bundle exec pod install
scripts.pods: cd ios && rm -rf Pods && rm -f Podfile.lock && USE_FRAMEWORKS=static bundle exec pod install
scripts.nuke: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf ios/build && rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -rf ./ios/Pods && yarn
scripts.build:ios: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace LucraSDKExample.xcworkspace -scheme LucrasdkExample -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator CC=clang CPLUSPLUS=clang++ LD=clang LDPLUSPLUS=clang++ GCC_OPTIMIZATION_LEVEL=0 GCC_PRECOMPILE_PREFIX_HEADER=YES ASSETCATALOG_COMPILER_OPTIMIZATION=time DEBUG_INFORMATION_FORMAT=dwarf COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO
